firm.name: Nexus Global Infrastructure

services.name: Strategic Financing
services.description: Provision of capital and credit guarantees for long-term infrastructure.

services.name: Heavy Equipment Logistics
services.description: Procurement and transport of specialized machinery.

project.name: Amazonas Smart Grid Phase I
project.description: Development of a decentralized renewable energy grid to stabilize power supply in the northern Amazonas region.

ops_requirements.name: Capital Mobilization
ops_requirements.description: Securing upfront funding for grid hardware.

ops_requirements.name: Industrial Equipment Supply
ops_requirements.description: Sourcing and deploying transformers and substations.
